dialogue.content:
You squeeze into the air vent, and take a deep breath. What the hell just happened?! Now the faculty is after you?!...You lost your temper back there...CRAP. You don't want to go back to anger management. 
You continue forward, the metal is cold and it's a tight fit. You can hear all the noises of school below you. The sounds reverberate throughout the vent.
You crawl forward, and come to a fork in the road.
You choose left and continue to crawl. Below you are voices. You look through an opening in the vent. You are right over the computer lab. There is something going on...

GIRL: Do you have any more xans? 
 BOY: I've got two left. 
GIRL: How much do you want for 'em? 
BOY: 20 each. 
You continue forward to the middle path. 
YOU: The drugs kids do at this school are insane.

You choose right and continue to crawl. From below, you hear voices. There is an opening in the vent, you are over the weight gym. Some football jocks are bench press spotting their skinnier, Freshman teammate.

JOCK: C'mon Freshman! GET STRONGER! 
FRESHMAN: I'm trying! 
JOCK: You gotta earn your spot on the team! 
The Freshman can't hold the barbell. 
FRESHMAN: GRAB IT!! 
JOCK: You're fine. 
The Freshman's elbows give out. The Jock shakes his head in frustration. 
FRESHMAN: What the hell, I thought you were spotting me?!
You make it to the middle path. Up ahead, there are more voices coming from an opening. These don't sound like students. You inch closer to the open vent and listen...

MR. MATTHEWS: Have you received your bonus yet? 
MS. BIDNER: No, but I was told end of day. 
MR. MATTHEWS: I can't believe they pulled this off... 
MS. BIDNER: Me neither.

The door opens, a third person enters the room. Both teachers immediately fall silent. The vent creaks beneath you. 
TEACHER #3: Hi, Mr. Matthews, Ms. Bidner. What was that I heard you discussing?

You recognize the voice, and crawl slowly towards the open vent. You look down - it's MS. GRABLES. 
MR. MATTHEWS: We weren't talking about anything... 
MS. GRABLES: You'll have to excuse me. 
 Grables tone turns aggressive. 
MS. GRABLES: I just stepped out for a moment to grab my coffee, but I heard something about a bonus?

Ms. Grables harrowing tone scares both teachers. 
MS. GRABLES: Talking about this at school? Imagine if someone heard you. This needs this to be air tight or none of us get anything. Use your fucking heads.

MS. BIDNER: I'm sorry, Mary... 
Ms. Grables turns her eyes towards MR. MATTHEWS... 
MS. GRABLES: Where is your apology?

MR. MATTHEWS: I'm sorry. It won't happen again. 
The creaky vent starts to RATTLE, the three teachers look up towards you. You try to get out of sight, but the movement is too much - BOOM! The metal vent busts open. You crash into the teacher's lounge.
You SLAM onto the teacher's lounge coffee table.

Ms. Grables and the two teachers stand back in shock. Ms. Grables suddenly realizes who just landed in front of her. 
MS. GRABLES: HE HEARD US! GET 'EM TO FOSTER, NOW! 
Mr. Matthews and Ms. Bidner dive for you, Ms. Grables yells for security.

You take off sprinting down the hallway, dodging two girls gossiping by the classroom doorway. 
GIRLS: Watch it! 
Security and Faculty are already in hot pursuit.
YOU continue running down the hallway, evading student after student, Faculty is on your tail. Ahead of you is a security guard; This guy is a brawler. You have to think fast.
The security guard lunges forward, but you're nimble. You JUMP over the bulky security guard, and clear his reach - NOPE! An arm grabs your collar, yanking you backwards. You are caught.
The security guard lunges forward, but you're nimble. You SLIDE along the waxey floor, evading his reach. You've cleared him...NOPE! An arm grabs your collar and yanks you backwards. You are caught.
